channel.title: Need help! how do i rep ppl!?!?!
channel.description:
hi guys.... ;)
i need help :rolleyes:
i dont know how to rep ppl can anybody help me? :confused: :mad:

item.title: Need help! how do i rep ppl!?!?!

@MastrChief wrote:

No, hand it out and beg for it like its a fucking necessity to life.

item.title: Need help! how do i rep ppl!?!?!

By asking this question, I get the feeling you are one of the many that will treat rep like water.
[/quote]
By that you mean?[/quote]

Abuse it, you abuse water, air, and life to much.
You don’t take the time to think about what you are saying.

item.title: Need help! how do i rep ppl!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Well firstly you need to have 15+ rep and your only 10 rep to get rep you don’t make stupid topics but you help people then when you have 15+ rep you click on the [Rep++] thing under the username of the person you are repping sometimes its easy to get rep if your good at something and you help other people with it but sometimes it isn’t like in my case i haven’t got a single rep but the most important thing to remember is not to ask for rep, and soon you will be repping people!!
*EDIT: Reading over post did i say “Rep” too many times?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help! how do i rep ppl!?!?!
